questions.question: What do we meant by meaningful play?

options.text: That the rules of the game provide a fair contest
That there is an enjoyable outcome from the game
That the game has strong narrative content
That it is easy to link your actions to consequences
That the play results in meaning

questions.question: The technical definition of feedback is

options.text: When the output of a system is used as part of the input in the next time interval
